ivardefs.name: actionReason_
ivardefs.desc: Reason or purpose for the action stipulated by this Contract Provision.

ivardefs.name: action_
ivardefs.desc: Action stipulated by this Contract Provision.

ivardefs.name: agent_
ivardefs.desc: An actor taking a role in an activity for which it can be assigned some degree of responsibility for the activity taking place.

ivardefs.name: applies
ivardefs.desc: Relevant time or time-period when this Contract Provision is applicable.

ivardefs.name: identifier
ivardefs.desc: Unique identifier for this particular Contract Provision.

ivardefs.name: issued
ivardefs.desc: When this Contract Provision was issued.

ivardefs.name: securityLabel_
ivardefs.desc: A set of security labels that define which terms are controlled by this condition.

ivardefs.name: subType
ivardefs.desc: Subtype of this Contract Provision, e.g. life time maximum payment for a contract term for specific valued item, e.g. disability payment.

ivardefs.name: text
ivardefs.desc: Human readable form of this Contract Provision.

ivardefs.name: topic_
ivardefs.desc: The matter of concern in the context of this provision of the agrement.

ivardefs.name: type
ivardefs.desc: Type of Contract Provision such as specific requirements, purposes for actions, obligations, prohibitions, e.g. life time maximum benefit.

properties.desc: One or more Contract Provisions, which may be related and conveyed as a group, and may contain nested groups.
